video.title: Super Why!
video.synopsis: Wyatt and his pals, the Super Readers, solve problems by consulting classic stories such as Little Miss Muffet, Hansel and Gretel and more.

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt and the Super Why crew present the story of a sleeping princess who can feel a pea through twenty mattresses.
episodes.title: Jack and the Beanstalk & Other Story Book Adventures: Jack and the Beanstalk

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt and the Super Why crew present the story of adventurous boy who climbs his way to an ogre's lair high in the sky.
episodes.title: Jack and the Beanstalk & Other Story Book Adventures: Princess and the Pea

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt and the Super Why crew present the story of three very different pigs who are stalked by a big bad wolf.
episodes.title: Jack and the Beanstalk & Other Story Book Adventures: The Three Little Pigs

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt and the Super Why crew present the story of a young girl who crosses paths with a scary wolf while on the way to grandmother's house.
episodes.title: Jack and the Beanstalk & Other Story Book Adventures: Little Red Riding Hood

episodes.synopsis: Princess Pea is blowing bubbles with Whyatt, and misses her tea party. They then read Alice in Wonderland to find out how she could be on time.
episodes.title: Rapunzel and Other Stories: Alice in Wonderland

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt gets in big trouble with his older brother Jack for messing up Jack's room, and Goldilocks and the Three Bears will help him solve his problem.
episodes.title: Rapunzel and Other Stories: Goldilocks and the Three Bears

episodes.synopsis: Princess Pea's kitten gets stuck in a tree, and the Super Readers use the story of Rapunzel to figure out how to bring the kitty back to safety.
episodes.title: Rapunzel and Other Stories: Rapunzel

episodes.synopsis: Pig is told by his brothers that he's too young and small to have an adventure of his own, and he learns to be OK with his size from Tom Thumb.
episodes.title: Rapunzel and Other Stories: Tom Thumb

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt and his friends are playing kickball in the park when Wolfy erases the score. The super readers fly into a comic book to track down the Eraser.
episodes.title: Attack of the Eraser: The Comic Book: Attack of the Eraser

episodes.synopsis: When his mom tells him that the Tooth Fairy will come and take his first lost tooth, Whyatt wants to know what happens if he wants to keep it.
episodes.title: Attack of the Eraser: The Story of the Tooth Fairy

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt wants to bake Baby Joy a special birthday cake, but he doesn't know how. Super Why and his friends get the info they need from a rhyming chef.
episodes.title: Attack of the Eraser: The Cookbook

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt wants to play baseball better, but he keeps missing the ball. The superhero readers join some fairytale heroes gearing up for a soccer match.
episodes.title: Attack of the Eraser: The Big Game

episodes.synopsis: Poor Pig is stuck at the top of his new slide! The Super Readers fly into the Humpty Dumpty book to find out how he'll get down from that wall.
episodes.title: Humpty Dumpty and Other Fairytale Adventures: Humpty Dumpty

episodes.synopsis: Red doesn't feel like a princess, so how will she fit in at Sleeping Beauty's party? The Super Readers magically leap into the book of Cinderella.
episodes.title: Humpty Dumpty and Other Fairytale Adventures: Cinderella

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt told a lie and feels really guilty! The Super Readers visit Pinocchio, a boy who also fibbed and whose nose is growing right before his eyes.
episodes.title: Humpty Dumpty and Other Fairytale Adventures: Pinocchio

episodes.synopsis: Princess Pea's father is too busy to help her tie her skates. The Super Readers visit another princess and her funny little helper, Rumpelstiltskin.
episodes.title: Humpty Dumpty and Other Fairytale Adventures: Rumpelstiltskin

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers catch up with Santa and his reindeer as they gallop from rooftop to rooftop.
episodes.title: Twas the Night Before Christmas & Other stories: Twas the Night Before Christmas

episodes.synopsis: It's Halloween in Storybrook Village, and Pig is so frightened that he won't go trick-or-treating with his friends!
episodes.title: Twas the Night Before Christmas & Other stories: The Ghost Who Was Afraid of Halloween

episodes.synopsis: Princess Pea wants to play in a rainbow, but her mother says it simply can't be done.
episodes.title: Twas the Night Before Christmas & Other stories: The Stars in the Sky

episodes.synopsis: Pig and his brothers are building a train set, but Pig's negative attitude has stopped him in his tracks.
episodes.title: Twas the Night Before Christmas & Other stories: The Three Feathers

episodes.synopsis: Princess Pea and Red are partners in a potato sack race but can't decide whether to go slow and steady or super fast.
episodes.title: The Tortoise and the Hare & Other Stories: Tortoise and the Hare

episodes.synopsis: When Baby Joy says her first words, Whyatt is the only one around to hear her, and he can't convince anyone that she actually talked.
episodes.title: The Tortoise and the Hare & Other Stories: The Boy Who Cried Wolf

episodes.synopsis: Princess Pea's twirls are falling flat and her dance recital is just days away.
episodes.title: The Tortoise and the Hare & Other Stories: The Ugly Duckling

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt has a secret admirer and he wants to know who it is.
episodes.title: The Tortoise and the Hare & Other Stories: The Elves and the Shoemaker

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers venture into the tale of "Little Miss Muffet" and meet a spider who is frightening his friend right off her tuffet.
episodes.title: Little Miss Muffet & Other Stories: Little Miss Muffet

episodes.synopsis: The Readers fly into the story of "The Ant and the Grasshopper" and see that the grasshopper is unprepared for winter because he didn't plan ahead.
episodes.title: Little Miss Muffet & Other Stories: The Ant and the Grasshopper

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers take off into the story of "The Little Red Hen" and see that her friends won't assist her.
episodes.title: Little Miss Muffet & Other Stories: The Little Red Hen

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers check out "The Frog Prince" and meet a princess who can't see eye to eye with her friend.
episodes.title: Little Miss Muffet & Other Stories: The Frog Prince

episodes.synopsis: When Red is kept out of the kitchen, the Super Readers get into "The Three Billy Goats Gruff" to learn why a troll won't let the goats cross a bridge.
episodes.title: The Three Billy Goats Gruff & Other Stories: The Three Billy Goats Gruff

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt can't find Mr. Lizard, and the Super Readers come to the rescue when they meet Little Bo Peep, who's hot on the trail of her lost sheep.
episodes.title: The Three Billy Goats Gruff & Other Stories: Little Bo Peep

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers dive into "The Emperor's New Clothes" and meet someone -- besides Pig -- who doesn't want to look silly in front of his friends.
episodes.title: The Three Billy Goats Gruff & Other Stories: The Emperor's New Clothes

episodes.synopsis: To learn why Whyatt's family is acting cagey, he and the Super Readers enter the tale of "The Twelve Dancing Princesses," who are just as secretive.
episodes.title: The Three Billy Goats Gruff & Other Stories: The Twelve Dancing Princesses

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers shrink down to the size of ants in the story "Thumbelina" and join teeny tiny Thumbelina on her quest to find her missing brother.
episodes.title: Thumbelina & Other Stories: Thumbelina

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers zip into the story "Beauty and the Beast" and get to know the Beast himself. Turns out, he isn't so beastly after all.
episodes.title: Thumbelina & Other Stories: Beauty and the Beast

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers dash into the Australian folk tale "Tiddalick the Frog" and meet a funny amphibian whose puddle jumping is using up all the water.
episodes.title: Thumbelina & Other Stories: Tiddalick the Frog

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers travel into the story of "Sleeping Beauty" to meet a princess who loves sleeping. They must apply their literacy powers to wake her.
episodes.title: Thumbelina & Other Stories: Sleeping Beauty

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers fly into the story of "The Magic Porridge Pot" to rescue a little girl whose magical pot just won't stop making porridge.
episodes.title: The Magic Porridge Pot & Other Stories: The Magic Porridge Pot

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt gets to pick one toy from the toy store, but there are just too many choices!
episodes.title: The Magic Porridge Pot & Other Stories: The Foolish Wishes

episodes.synopsis: Red's friends would love to try some of her delicious apples, but Red wants to keep them all for herself!
episodes.title: The Magic Porridge Pot & Other Stories: The Goose and the Golden Eggs

episodes.synopsis: Pig and his brothers want to build a tree house, but they're so busy squabbling, they'll never get the job done.
episodes.title: The Magic Porridge Pot & Other Stories: Momotaro: The Peach Boy

episodes.synopsis: Run, run as fast as you can! As Pig zooms through the playground at top speed, he can't figure out why Poppa Pig keeps telling him to slow down!
episodes.title: The Gingerbread Man & Other Stories: The Gingerbread Boy

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers dive into the story of the Little Mermaid to talk with someone whose tail sets her apart from kids on land.
episodes.title: The Gingerbread Man & Other Stories: The Little Mermaid

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers fly into a Puerto Rican folktale to meet a boy who thinks his mother wants him to put his pig in a dress.
episodes.title: The Gingerbread Man & Other Stories: Juan Bobo and the Pig

episodes.synopsis: The Storybrook Carnival is in town, and Princess Pea is enjoying lots of yummy treats -- until she gets a terrible tummy ache.
episodes.title: The Gingerbread Man & Other Stories: Snow White

episodes.synopsis: Red drops her basket of goodies and finds it ... in the hands of Wolfy! When Red takes her basket back, Wolfy is really sad.
episodes.title: The Rolling Rice Cakes & Other Stories: The Rolling Rice Cakes

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt's big brother Jack is sick, and Whyatt wants to give him a picture to make him feel better.
episodes.title: The Rolling Rice Cakes & Other Stories: The Boy Who Drew Cats

episodes.synopsis: Princess Pea is wishing for a playhouse to appear, but no matter how many times she waves her wand, nothing happens!
episodes.title: The Rolling Rice Cakes & Other Stories: Alladin

episodes.synopsis: The Giant has stepped on Pig's toy, and he's scared to ask for it back!
episodes.title: The Rolling Rice Cakes & Other Stories: George and the Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Super Why and his friends fly into the story of a king with the golden touch who thinks that more is better, but all he ends up with is more problems!
episodes.title: King Midas & Other Stories: King Midas

episodes.synopsis: Red is writing a new song but gets stuck because she can't think of the right word! To help her out, Super Why and his friends meet Mother Goose.
episodes.title: King Midas & Other Stories: Mother Goose

episodes.synopsis: Super Why and his friends fly into the story "Muddled Up Fairytales," where they visit a young dragon who is eager to find a legend of his own.
episodes.title: King Midas & Other Stories: Muddled Up Fairy Tales

episodes.synopsis: Super Why and his friends head into the story of "The Swiss Family Robinson" to meet a family that is stranded on an island.
episodes.title: King Midas & Other Stories: The Swiss Family Robinson

episodes.synopsis: X marks the spot! Whyatt and his buddies have found a clue leading to treasure, and they need a little help.
episodes.title: Beach Day Mystery & Other Stories: Beach Day Mystery

episodes.synopsis: Princess Pea doesn't know what to do about her friend Sleeping Beauty, who is very, very grumpy!
episodes.title: Beach Day Mystery & Other Stories: Nutcracker

episodes.synopsis: Red really doesn't want her playdate with Little Boy Blue to end, so she hides his horn.
episodes.title: Beach Day Mystery & Other Stories: The Swan Maiden

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt's big brother Jack is going off to college, and Whyatt is going to miss him so much!
episodes.title: Beach Day Mystery & Other Stories: City Mouse and Country Mouse

episodes.synopsis: Red's adorable new puppy is whimpering and whining and she just doesn't know why!
episodes.title: Dr. Dolittle & Other Stories: Dr. Dolittle

episodes.synopsis: Whyatt thinks his house is too loud, while Princess Pea believes her home is too quiet! Would the friends be better off if they switched places?
episodes.title: Dr. Dolittle & Other Stories: Prince and the Pauper

episodes.synopsis: Peter Piper gets mad when Red takes his peppers without asking.
episodes.title: Dr. Dolittle & Other Stories: Hansel and Gretel

episodes.synopsis: There's a mystery in Storybrook Village -- the case of the broken guitar strings! Jack thinks Whyatt is the culprit.
episodes.title: Dr. Dolittle & Other Stories: Goldilocks and the Three Bears: The Mystery

episodes.synopsis: The superhero readers zoom into the story of "The Ugly Duckling: Becoming a Swan" and meet a little guy who is experiencing growing pains.
episodes.title: The Ugly Duckling & Other Stories: The Ugly Duckling: Becoming a Swan

episodes.synopsis: Super Why and his friends head into the story of Hansel and Gretel, where they meet a tired and grouchy witch.
episodes.title: The Ugly Duckling & Other Stories: Hansel & Gretel: A Healthy Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Super Why and his friends soar into Cinderella's fairy tale once again, and this time, they talk to the prince!
episodes.title: The Ugly Duckling & Other Stories: Cinderella: The Prince's Side of the Story

episodes.synopsis: Super Why and his friends visit the tale of "The Three Little Pigs," hoping to find out a little bit about building from the young Poppa Pig.
episodes.title: The Ugly Duckling & Other Stories: The Three Little Pigs: The Return of the Wolf

episodes.synopsis: A new Super Reader joins the team when Whyatt attends a pet-adoption fair and meets a puppy that needs a family.
episodes.title: Bedtime for Bear & Other Stories: Woofster Finds a Home

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers learn about fighting germs from a heroic little penguin trying to save his town from the dirty Squirmy Germies.
episodes.title: Bedtime for Bear & Other Stories: Webby in Bathland

episodes.synopsis: To alleviate Baby Joy's fear of the dark, the Super Readers enter a story about a bear named Charlie, who's afraid of nearly everything.
episodes.title: Bedtime for Bear & Other Stories: Bedtime for Bear

episodes.synopsis: The curtain rises on Princess Pea's dance recital, but she's afraid to come out of the wings, prompting the Super Readers to learn about stage fright.
episodes.title: King Eddie & Other Stories: Molly and the Magic Slippers

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers find out about healthy diets by delving into a story about a wacky king who only wants to eat one thing: spaghetti.
episodes.title: King Eddie & Other Stories: King Eddie Who Loves Spaghetti

episodes.synopsis: Pig and his friends find an Egyptian treasure map but can't make out the symbols. To crack the mysterious code, the Super Readers visit ancient Egypt.
episodes.title: King Eddie & Other Stories: Naila and the Magic Map

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers jump into a Wild West tale and meet Jasper, who's desperate to become a rootin' tootin' cowboy.
episodes.title: Jasper's Cowboy Wish & Other Stories: Jasper's Cowboy Wish

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers lend a hand to a baby dinosaur searching for its mother.
episodes.title: Jasper's Cowboy Wish & Other Stories: Baby Dino's Big Discovery

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers fly into a story about a princess with a silly sense of humor -- and a big job to do.
episodes.title: Jasper's Cowboy Wish & Other Stories: Princess Gwennie Saves the Day

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers have to put on their creative problem-solving hats to help a boy's robo-doggie win a race.
episodes.title: The Great Robot Race & Other Stories: The Great Robot Race

episodes.synopsis: To help Pig with his mathematics, the Super Readers accompany a math superhero as he confronts a series of arithmetic emergencies.
episodes.title: The Great Robot Race & Other Stories: The Adventures of Math-A-Million

episodes.synopsis: Red can't settle on which musical instrument she wants to play, so the Super Readers jump into a story about a lovable monster with the same problem.
episodes.title: The Great Robot Race & Other Stories: Monty's Adventures in Music Town

episodes.synopsis: When Pig can't decide what to paint in art class, the Super Readers venture into a magical museum with a young artist who's looking for ideas.
episodes.title: Galileo's Space Adventure & Other Stories: Zora's Art Adventure

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers take a trip around the world with a wacky explorer named Wigglesbottom, who's on the hunt for his friend Sophie.
episodes.title: Galileo's Space Adventure & Other Stories: Around the World Adventure

episodes.synopsis: The Super Readers blast off to investigate the solar system with a young astronaut seeking to rescue his beloved teddy bear.
episodes.title: Galileo's Space Adventure & Other Stories: Galileo's Space Adventure
